description: Google Labs repo for rapid prototyping

scripts.sync: npm i && npm run clean:build && turbo build --force --no-daemon
scripts.deep-clean:build: rm -rf node_modules seeds/*/node_modules package-lock.json && npm run sync
scripts.ci:local: npm run clean:build && turbo build && turbo lint && npm run check:format && turbo test

author: Google Labs Team
